Articles.Content:
So, I came up with a way that could provide endless fun even when you finish career mode.

Achievements earn you "medals".

There are 4 types of medals that you can earn.

Basic Medals (Bronze medal)

Experience Medal (Silver medal)

Expert Medal (Gold medal)

Legendary Medal (Diamond medal)

Stats don't earn you anything. It's merely just to look back at what you have accomplished.

These are the stats ideas I came up with:

Successful missions to Eve:

Successful missions to Duna:

Successful missions to Moho:

Successful missions to Dres:

Successful missions to Eeloo:

Successful missions to Eve and back:

Successful missions to Duna and back:

Successful missions to Moho and back:

Successful missions to Dres and back:

Successful missions to Eve and back:

Total successful missions:

Total failed missions:

Successful missions to Mun and back:

Successful missions to Minmus and back:

Successful missions to Mun:

Successful missions to Minmus:

Flags planted:

Total science:

Successful missions from interplanetary space and back:

Normal achievements can be earned once and you get a medal for it.

Milestone achievements are earned and replaced.

For example, pretend there was a milestone achievement "Get 500 meters off the ground". When you get the achievement, it would be replaced with the same achievement, but a bigger number, like "Get 847 meters off the ground".

Bronze achievement ideas:

I was here!-Plant a flag

0 gravity-Get out of the atmosphere

Brave astronaut-Go on an interplanetary mission.

Astronaut sacrifice-Send 5 kerbals into space on a single mission

Exceptional rocket scientist-Unlock 10 parts of the tech tree

Silver achievement ideas:

Spy-Send a probe into space

Alien-Get an encounter with another planet

Rocket scientist-Unlock half of the tech tree

Cheap-Get into space using 8 or less parts

Easter egg explorer-Walk up to 3 different easter eggs

I'm coming home!-Send a ship into orbit, then make it land at the KSC, runway, or Launchpad.

Visiting the penguins-Get into orbit and then land in the poles

Mun Monster-Get into orbit around the Mun

Minmus express-Get into orbit around Minmus

Gold achievement ideas:

Mun Landing: Land a ship on the Mun

Minmus Landing: Land a ship on Minmus

Foreign orbiter: Get into orbit around another planet

Nerdy rocket scientist: Unlock the entire tech tree

Meltdown: Get closer to Kerbol than Moho

Escapee: Leave the Solar system

Feeling gassy: Crash into Jool

Diamond achievement ideas:

Just like Kerbin!: Land on Laythe

We come in peace: Land on any moon excluding Minmus, Mun, or Laythe.

Dres Explorer: Land on Dres

Icy rock: Land on Eeloo

Martian: Land on Duna

The purple planet: Land on Eve

Massive furnace: Land on Moho

Milestone achievements:

Land on Eve 2 times (Number increases by 3 each time)

Land on Duna 2 times (Number increase by 3)

Land on Moho 2 times (Increase by 2)

Land on Dres 2 times (Increase by 2)

Land on Eeloo 2 times (Increase by 1)

Get closer to the Sun than Moho 4 times (Increase by 4)

Get to Mun 3 times (Increase by 2)

Get to Minmus 2 times (Increase by 2)

Get to Laythe 2 times (Increase by 3)

Get to another another moon besides Laythe, Mun or Minmus 3 times (Increase by 3)

Get 10 science (Increase by 50)

Get 10 medals (Increase by 5)

There is a new building for the medals, which is called the museum, where you can view your medals.
